Title: Godiva Solid Wood Chest of Drawers in Provincial Teak Finish

Details.Dimensions:: H 32 x W 39 x D 18 (all dimensions in inches)

Description: Woodsworth is our premium homegrown label thats part classic, part contemporary. A delectable amalgamation of the timeless and trendy, a precarious balance of function and flair. Woodsworth is a harmonious fit for all tastes, styles and spaces. Contemporary is very current and in trend, of the here and now. Its a very fluid, simplistic style which takes its cues from the in-vogue polishes, textures and colors of the season and is bereft of any ornamentation or embellishments. A chest of drawers, also called a bureau, is a type of cabinet that has multiple parallel, horizontal drawers usually stacked one above another. Chests of drawers have traditionally been used for storing clothing, especially underwear, socks, and other items not normally hung in or otherwise stored in a closet. They are usually placed in a bedroom for this purpose but can actually be used to store anything that will fit inside.  Furniture bought on Pepperfry.com comes with a 3 Year Warranty against any manufacturing defects. So go ahead and buy with confidence.
